page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: EVERY SUMMER OUR SCHOOL HAS A SUMMER FAIR.EVERYONE IN THE VILLAGE COMES AND ALL THE MONEY GOES TO THE P.T.A.FUND TO SPEND ON THINGS FOR THE SCHOOL. WE HAVE RACES,A TOMBOLA,RAFFLE,STALLS SELLING THINGS,GAMES TO PLAY,PONY RIDES,MUSIC,TEAS AND REFRESHMENTS,A BARBECUE,COMPUTER GAMES. WE ALL ENJOY THAT DAY VERY MUCH. MAYPOLE DANCING. WE HAVE A SMALL MAYPOLE WHICH WE CAN USE EITHER INSIDE OR OUTSIDE.IT HAS 16 RED,WHITE AND BLUE BRAIDS.WE ALWAYS DANCE ON THE 1st MAY AND THEN LEARN SOME OF THE DANCES.THIS YEAR WE ARE LEARNING 1 THE BARBER'S POLE OR CIRCLING 2 SINGLE PLAIT 3 SPIDER'S WEB 4 POP GOES THE WEASEL
